content:
Was working on https://github.com/bytecodealliance/wasmtime/pull/11748 and was wondering if it was possible / desired to have run tests that test for trapping behaviour too (as well as testing that in the happy case the outcome is the same)?

Constant propagation opts by KGrewal1 路 Pull Request #11748 路 bytecodealliance/wasmtime
Add opts for ctz and clz - issues #11725 Add opts for srem and urem
We don't have the ability to test traps in Cranelift runtests unfortunately
If a trapping case is exposed to Wasm (e.g. for i32/i64 types) then feel free to add a wast test for it, though!
